bulletin_message.00: Seu cl√£ provou ser gracioso e seus jardins saborosos. Muitos de meus parentes desconfiam da prog√™nie da Cobra, mas eu sinto que devemos estender uma pata de amizade.

Alguns orcs de alguma forma encontraram uma entrada para nosso casebre e est√£o pedindo ... um monte de portas de madeira? N√£o temos madeira nem carpinteiro nas patas, ent√£o voc√™ poderia criar algumas para n√≥s?

Alternativamente, n√£o temos medo de lutar contra eles, mas n√£o temos os meios para curar nossos feridos depois.

"Obrigado, tenho certeza que aqueles grandes orcs v√£o achar isso bastante satisfat√≥rio. Que nossa amizade flores√ßa!" Ele oferece bolsas cintilantes como forma de pagamento.

[Aumentou a reputa√ß√£o com os coelhos]
"Eu entendo. Faz um tempo que n√£o ou√ßo nenhum uivo, acho que os odores dos seus goblins podem t√™-los confundidos. Melhor j√° partir, pelo caminho mais longo ..."

"Sauda√ß√µes, gentis goblins. Como voc√™s sabem, vivemos sob o solo e, por isso, contamos com Amberstone, nosso material hom√¥nimo, para muitas coisas."

"Amberstones podem absorver muitos tipos de energia, sendo a luz solar uma delas - e essas pedras aqui perderam seu brilho. "
"Eu entendo. Talvez da pr√≥xima vez. Adeus, goblins."

"Caros goblins, alguns do meu cl√£ respeitam a efici√™ncia de seus ca√ßadores. Ser√° que algum poderia nos visitar por dois dias, para que possamos aprender seus m√©todos e adapt√°-los para nosso pr√≥prio uso?"

"Forneceremos os suprimentos, e eles ser√£o um convidado de honra em nossa toca. "

"Precisamos de algu√©m com experi√™ncia em madeira por dois dias, para ajudar a preparar um t√∫nel e colocar um novo dep√≥sito de vegetais."

" Voc√™ estaria disposto a enviar algu√©m? N√≥s iremos fornecer os suprimentos, e eles ser√£o um convidado de honra aqui na toca. "

‚ÄúPrecisamos de algu√©m experiente com materiais duros por dois dias, para nos ajudar a forjar novos equipamento de escava√ß√£o.‚Äù

‚ÄúVoc√™ estaria disposto a ceder algu√©m? N√≥s forneceremos os suprimentos, e eles ser√£o um convidado de honra aqui na toca. "

"Nossos m√©dicos gostariam de trocar informa√ß√µes com um de seus xam√£s por alguns dias."

"Voc√™ estaria disposto a emprestar algu√©m? N√≥s forneceremos os suprimentos, e eles ser√£o convidados de honra na toca. "

bulletin_message.00: Sasha Lightfoot se aproxima, com um pequeno inseto de pedra balan√ßando indo atr√°s dele. "Amigos! N√£o muito tempo atr√°s, minha esp√©cie tinha medo de voc√™s parentes da Cobra, mas voc√™s dissolveram nossa ansiedade sem prop√≥sito! Encontramos em voc√™s um aliado confi√°vel na superf√≠cie!"

"Meus queridos amigos goblins! J√° se passaram gera√ß√µes desde que n√≥s, Lapine, encontramos um aliado t√£o confi√°vel quanto voc√™s. Decidimos oferecer-lhes um presente precioso."

"Gostar√≠amos de levar um dos seus para nossa toca por um tempo, para ensin√°-los a arte da geomancia. "

" Voc√™ entende como a geomancia √© vital para n√≥s, da hist√≥ria de minha esp√©cie e do cl√£ Amberstone? "

Sasha acena sabiamente. "Este mundo de Hearth √© governado pelos Ciclos Celestiais. Cada √©on traz uma entidade diferente para a Ascens√£o, que eleva sua pr√≥pria esp√©cie a um estado evolu√≠do."

"O Macaco est√° em Ascens√£o agora, dando aos Humanos forma e intelig√™ncia. A Cobra existia antes. O Coelho antes disso; h√° muito tempo, mas voc√™ pode encontrar nossas est√°tuas pontuando a paisagem at√© agora. "
"Espl√™ndido! Eu acho que mesmo um Ferreiro de Ossos e Mestre Terra novato funcionariam bem, contanto que eles sejam receptivos ao ensino. N√£o deve demorar mais do que dois dias."
"Hum. Bem, acho que talvez eu ainda tenha muito a aprender sobre a est√©tica dos goblins, afinal ..."

"Cordiais sauda√ß√µes, amigos goblins! Tive uma ideia depois de observar seus artes√£os trabalhando - voc√™ gostaria de enviar um Ferreiro de Ossos e um Mestre Terra para nossa toca por alguns dias, para aprender nossas v√°rias receitas e t√©cnicas de artesanato?"

bulletin_message.00:
"Queridos amigos da Cobra, trago sauda√ß√µes e votos de boa sorte da vig√©sima terceira toca da Amberstone."

Orcs, teimosos, permaneceram e lutaram contra as corrup√ß√µes, lutaram contra as apari√ß√µes de um mundo natural levado √† raiva, defendendo as terras abandonados pelos humanos. E n√≥s, Lapinos, j√° subterr√¢neos, contentamo-nos em esperar. "

Estes fragmentos absorvem aquela magia, lentamente ganhando for√ßa ao longo das gera√ß√µes, solidificando em aspectos mal√©volos que passamos a chamar de 'Tit√£s'. "

"Com isso conclu√≠do, retornaremos com a arma e, uma vez que voc√™ estiver preparado, n√≥s a usaremos para invocar, atacar e destruir o Tit√£. O ataque pode levar um tempo significativo, ent√£o voc√™ deve se preparar para uma invas√£o."

"Eu deveria dizer ... este mal n√£o √© uma amea√ßa imediata para voc√™. Esta √© uma tarefa para beneficiar os filhos de seu povo e os meus."

cattail.description: A fibra desta planta pode ser transformada em fios.
cattail.unripe_description: Esta planta foi colhida e ainda n√£o cresceu novamente

seed.description: As pequenas sementes de uma grande planta

sprout.description: S√≥ precisa de algum tempo e cuidado.

giant_flower.description: Pode ser colhido para ervas curativas
giant_flower.unripe_description: Esta planta foi colhida e ainda n√£o cresceu novamente

seed.description: The small seeds of a giant flower

sprout.description: Just needs some time and care.

mushroom.description: Harvestable for a meager food supply.
mushroom.unripe_description: This mushroom has been harvested and has not grown back yet

mushroom_garden.unripe_description: The mushroom in this garden has not fully grown yet

lilypad.description: Floats and can hold up a lot of weight

jewel.flavor: Tem as propriedades m√°gicas das ess√™ncias e minerais usados para cri√°-las.

giant_flower.description: An herb commonly used for medicinal purposes

firefly_essense.flavor: Essential ingredient for many magic related recipes

big_g.description: Beloved and playful, helped his generation through tough times

big_wolf.description: Playful with allies, a beast for the enemies.

poyo.description: Elite Poyo summoned to help in the fight

seed.description: Plantable to grow a bogger tree
Plantable to grow a cypress tree

magma_sword.flavor: Deve ser abilidoso para faze-la. E abilidoso para usa-la.

skull_basher.description: Tente mirar na cabe√ßa do inimigo

beast_tamer_description.description: Invoca e controla animais em batalha

level_1_data.perk_000_description: A group of elite Poyos called the Four Feathers will join and help in the fight

level_2_data.perk_000_description: Summons local fauna wildlife to help in the battle

level_3_data.perk_000_description: Immobilize enemies using traps, the amount based on this goblin mind stat

level_4_data.perk_000_description: Summons a pair of varanus into the fight

level_5_data.perk_000_description: Casts a cloud of fireflies into enemies, confusing and blinding them

level_6_data.perk_000_description:
(Goblins only)
With the combined power of a (max level) Spirit Walker, they summon an ancient Dragon Spirit into battle
level_6_data.perk_001_description:
(Hearthlings only)
Summons a big wolf, one that inspires your allies and scares the enemies.

bonesmith_description.description: Crafts basic items with materials like wood and fiber

level_3_data.perk_000_description: When inspiration strikes, the Bonesmith may now craft an especially Fine quality of item.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: The Bonesmith can now create items of Excellent quality, and will make Fine quality items more often.

bonesmith_workbench.description: Only simple tasks should be done here

weaving_table.description: A place to weave armors, even the hard solid ones

earthmaster_description.description: Craft advance items and decorations using hard materials like stone and clay

level_1_data.perk_000_description: From the advanced materials, stone is the most basic one. Still, quite a leap compared to the usual wood and fiber stuff.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: Crafting with clay is always interesting, such a soft material when modelled and heated end almost as solid as stone.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: When inspiration strikes, the Earthmaster may now craft an especially Fine quality of item.
level_3_data.perk_001_description: What about rocks and metals as soft as clay? Liquid fire as some call it.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: The Earthmaster can now create items of Excellent quality, and will make Fine quality items more often.

wood.description: Break the object back into a wood piece

stone.description: Break the object back into a stone piece

clay.description: Break the object back into a clay piece

raw_stone.description: A mix of clay and chitin powder heated up to rock hard

shaman_description.description: Takes care of the clan well-being and growth

level_1_data.perk_000_description: A power source extract from nature by shamans, used in most of the clans activities.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: With an egg pedestal, goblins can do their most important ritual.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: When inspiration strikes, the Shaman may now craft an especially Fine quality of item.

level_4_data.perk_000_description: The Shaman is now skillful in different potions effects. Bad taste means better potions, they say.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: The Shaman can now create items of Excellent quality, and will make Fine quality items more often.

level_6_data.perk_000_description: The clan is in good shape, time to get fancy. Recipes from all over were collected and now easily available.

shaman_workbench.description: Shamans will use to craft their stuff

shaman_firefly_token.description: Shamans will use this to extract firefly essences

dreamcatcher_talisman.description: Helps with magic. Don't let your dreams just be dreams.

egg_pedestal.description: Used to lay eggs and take care of it

spirit_walker_description.description: Healer, summons spirits to help in fights

level_1_data.perk_000_description: Can heal in small amounts the health of allies

level_2_data.perk_000_description: Ranged attack, shoots spirit balls at enemies. Ball amount based on this goblin spirit stat.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: Summons multiple goblin spirits to help in the fight, the amount based on this goblin spirit stat

level_4_data.perk_000_description: Summons the beloved and playful goblin Big G. He helped his generation through tough times ages ago.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: All your Warriors will now be shielded by a defensive aura

level_6_data.perk_000_description: With the combined power of a (max level) Beast Tamer, they summon an ancient Dragon Spirit into battle

spirit_walker_staff_talisman.flavor: Promotes a goblin to Spirit Walker

warrior_description.description: Pride in fighting. Warriors are the ones to use heavy weapons and wear armor.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The basics are learned, gaining courage and increasing stamina

level_2_data.perk_000_description: Performs a Spin Attack that hits everyone around.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: Hits enemies far away with darts, poisoning them.

level_4_data.perk_000_description: Tougher skin for a faster health regeneration.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: Strength aquired from past fights grants +1 Body stat

level_6_data.perk_000_description: Stats gets higher the longer a fight lasts.

worker_description.description:
Workers perform basic tasks like harvesting resources, hauling stuff around, and constructing buildings.

‚öîÔ∏è Goblin workers can also fight and be in a combat party.

upgraded_outfit.description: Reinforced shiny talisman improves worker defenses, and it is fancy!

data.raid_egg: Watch out! Some bugs are after our eggs!

cover.title: About goblins and swamps
cover.text: * Pick the desired topic to read from the side menu

pedestal.title: Egg Pedestal
pedestal.description1: A nice cerimonial table for an important ocasion

topic1.title: Crafting:
topic1.desc1: The egg pedestal is crafted by the shaman of your clan

topic2.title: How to use:
topic2.desc1: After placing it, click on it. In the bottom left you will see its buttons. Click on the egg icon.
topic2.desc2: One of your goblins (worker only) will come to this pedestal and lay an egg.

egg.title: Goblin Egg
egg.description1: Who came first, the egg or the goblin?
egg.description2: Many goblins wondered about it for as long as they remember, but no one knows for sure.
egg.description3: The goblins current most acceptable hypotesys is that it was neither. It was a tie.

topic1.title: How to get:
topic1.desc1: An egg pedestal is needed first, for a goblin to lay his egg.

topic2.title: Hatching:
topic2.desc1: After one day, the egg will hatch into a baby goblin.

topic3.title: Protecting:
topic3.desc1: Watch out, the egg attracts wild animals.

topic1.title: Behaviour:
topic1.desc1: Eat, sleep, ask for attention, repeat.

topic2.title: Raising:
topic2.desc1: Just feed it, a lot. Babies eat 5 times more than adults, so watch your stocks!

topic3.title: Grow:
topic3.desc1: One more day and they grow into adult goblins.

topic1.title: Firefly Clan:
topic1.desc1: Now a fully member of society.

topic2.title: Jobs:
topic2.desc1: Can be promoted to Warrior, Shaman, Spirit Walker, Trapper, Beast Tamer, Bonesmith and Earthmaster.
topic2.desc2: (With mods, some other jobs may be possible too)

topic3.title: The good guys:
topic3.desc1: Different from the green goblins, often associated with trouble, these ones are way more behaved and rooted.

topic1.title: Description:
topic1.desc1: Fighter class, promoted from a Trapper. Can summon animals to fight, from little poyos to giant dragons.

topic2.title: What it does:
topic2.desc1: Aside from summoning animals, they can trap enemies and cast a firefly cloud, blinding and confusing them.
topic2.desc2: With the help of a Spirit Walker, they join forces and can summon an ancient dragon spirit.

topic3.title: Hearthling variation:
topic3.desc1: Hearthlings can be promoted to it too. Though the Spirit Walker teamwork to summon a dragon is now a solo effort to summon a Big Wolf.

topic1.title: Description:
topic1.desc1: Basic crafter class. From equipments to furniture and decorations.

topic2.title: What it does:
topic2.desc1: Uses low level materials like wood and fibers to craft simple items.
topic2.desc2: Starter houses uses mostly furniture and decoration from this class. Can also equip warriors with most of their weapons and armors.

topic3.title: Promotion:
topic3.desc1: Bonesmith can later be promoted into Earthmaster, an advanced highlevel crafter class.

topic1.title: Description:
topic1.desc1: Advanced crafter class. From equipments to furniture and decorations.

topic2.title: What it does:
topic2.desc1: Uses high level materials like stone and clay to craft furniture and decorations.
topic2.desc2: Can upgrade other classes tools and workbenches, and do some simple metal refining, like crafting firefly jewels, a high level crafting resource

topic3.title: Beyond crafting:
topic3.desc1: Earthmaster can recycle items made from wood, stone and clay, or burn wood items to make coal
topic3.desc2: The class can also repair most items, like door, turrets and other breakable gizmos

topic1.title: Description:
topic1.desc1: Starter crafter class. Central figure for the clan well-being and growth.

topic2.title: What it does:
topic2.desc1: Harvest firefly essence used to imbue items in magic, some cooking and herbalism.
topic2.desc2: Crafts all the clan talismans. Can also craft the egg pedestal, an important item for the clan growth.

topic3.title: Promotion:
topic3.desc1: Shamans can later be promoted into Spirit Walkers, a summoner/healer class.

topic1.title: Description:
topic1.desc1: Healer class, promoted from a Shaman. Can summon spirits to fight.

topic2.title: What it does:
topic2.desc1: Aside from summoning spirits and ranged attacks, they can heal some health of near allies by small amounts.

topic3.title: Class synergies:
topic3.desc1: Can cast a protective aura to all warriors, increasing their defenses
topic3.desc2: With the help of a Beast Tamer, they join forces and can summon an ancient dragon spirit.

topic1.title: Description:
topic1.desc1: Main fighter class. The muscles of the party.

topic2.title: What it does:
topic2.desc1: Close range fighter, have access to many goblin equipments, increasing their attack and defense.

topic3.title: Skills:
topic3.desc1: Can learn new abilities as they progress.
topic3.desc2: Can hit multiple enemies at once, use ranged poison darts, and even gets stronger stats.

topic1.title: Description:
topic1.desc1: Flying insects that glows at night. Loved by the goblins.

topic2.title: Behaviour:
topic2.desc1: Usually group in big clouds glowing at night under the trees

topic3.title: Interaction:
topic3.desc1: Can't be interacted directly, but shamans can extract magic powers from them, hence their clan name. Some goblins have a trait called Firefly Chaser, those goblins will walk into firefly clouds to admire them

topic1.title: Description:
topic1.desc1: Ambient small critters that can be found near the water.

topic2.title: Behaviour:
topic2.desc1: Spend their time jumping from one lilypad to another, hunting small insects. Very noisy at night.

topic3.title: Interaction:
topic3.desc1: Trappers can get them for food or even as pets, baby goblins love them.

topic1.title: Description:
topic1.desc1: Large reptiles with a hard skin, loves water.

topic2.title: Behaviour:
topic2.desc1: Usually hostile to those that get too close. Can be found near their nests at caves entrances.

topic3.title: Interaction:
topic3.desc1: When in the wild they are hostile, but a beast tamer can summon tamed varanus to fight with them.

topic1.title: Description:
topic1.desc1: Flying insects that glows at night. Loved by the goblins.

topic2.title: Behaviour:
topic2.desc1: Usually group in big clouds glowing at night under the trees

topic3.title: Interaction:
topic3.desc1: Can't be interacted directly, but shamans can extract magic powers from them, hence their clan name. Some goblins have a trait called Firefly Chaser, those will walk into firefly clouds to admire

topic2.title: Behaviour:
topic2.desc1: Spend their time jumping from one lilypad to another, hunting small insects. Very noisy at night.

topic3.title: Interaction:
topic3.desc1: Trappers can get them for food or even as pets, baby goblins love them.

topic2.title: Behaviour:

topic3.title: Interaction:
topic3.desc1: When in the wild they are hostile, but a beast tamer can summon tamed varanus to fight with them.
